verses.kjv: And in the seventh month, on the first day of the month, ye shall have an holy convocation; ye shall do no servile work: it is a day of blowing the trumpets unto you.
verses.web: “ ‘In the seventh month, on the first day of the month, you shall have a holy convocation; you shall do no regular work. It is a day of blowing of trumpets to you.
verses.ct: On the 1st day of the 7th month, you must hold a holy assembly. Don't do any regular work. This is a day for blowing trumpets.

verses.kjv: And ye shall offer a burnt offering for a sweet savour unto the LORD; one young bullock, one ram, and seven lambs of the first year without blemish:
verses.web: You shall offer a burnt offering for a pleasant aroma to LORD: one young bull, one ram, seven male lambs a year old without defect;
verses.ct: Present a burnt offering as a pleasing aroma to the LORD: 1 young bull, 1 ram, and 7 one-year-old male lambs, all without any defect.

verses.kjv: And their meat offering shall be of flour mingled with oil, three tenth deals for a bullock, and two tenth deals for a ram,
verses.web: and their meal offering, fine flour mixed with oil: three tenths for the bull, two tenths for the ram,
verses.ct: The grain offering that goes with them must be fine flour mixed with oil — 3 tenths of an ephah for the bull, 2 tenths for the ram,

verses.kjv: And one tenth deal for one lamb, throughout the seven lambs:
verses.web: and one tenth for every lamb of the seven lambs;
verses.ct: and 1 tenth for each of the 7 lambs.

verses.kjv: And one kid of the goats for a sin offering, to make an atonement for you:
verses.web: and one male goat for a sin offering, to make atonement for you;
verses.ct: Also offer 1 male goat as a sin offering to make atonement for you.

verses.kjv: Beside the burnt offering of the month, and his meat offering, and the daily burnt offering, and his meat offering, and their drink offerings, according unto their manner, for a sweet savour, a sacrifice made by fire unto the LORD.
verses.web: in addition to the burnt offering of the new moon with its meal offering, and the continual burnt offering with its meal offering, and their drink offerings, according to their ordinance, for a pleasant aroma, an offering made by fire to LORD.
verses.ct: These are in addition to the monthly burnt offering with its grain offering, the daily burnt offering with its grain offering, and their accompanying drink offerings — all prepared according to the established regulations as a pleasing aroma, an offering made by fire to the LORD.

verses.kjv: And ye shall have on the tenth day of this seventh month an holy convocation; and ye shall afflict your souls: ye shall not do any work therein:
verses.web: “ ‘On the tenth day of this seventh month you shall have a holy convocation. You shall afflict your souls. You shall do no kind of work;
verses.ct: On the 10th day of this 7th month, hold a holy assembly. You must deny yourselves and do no work of any kind.

verses.kjv: But ye shall offer a burnt offering unto the LORD for a sweet savour; one young bullock, one ram, and seven lambs of the first year; they shall be unto you without blemish:
verses.web: but you shall offer a burnt offering to LORD for a pleasant aroma: one young bull, one ram, seven male lambs a year old, all without defect;
verses.ct: Present a burnt offering to the LORD as a pleasing aroma: 1 young bull, 1 ram, and 7 one-year-old male lambs, all without any defect.

verses.kjv: And their meat offering shall be of flour mingled with oil, three tenth deals to a bullock, and two tenth deals to one ram,
verses.web: and their meal offering, fine flour mixed with oil: three tenths for the bull, two tenths for the one ram,
verses.ct: The grain offering that goes with them must be fine flour mixed with oil — 3 tenths of an ephah for the bull, 2 tenths for the ram,

verses.kjv: A several tenth deal for one lamb, throughout the seven lambs:
verses.web: one tenth for every lamb of the seven lambs;
verses.ct: and 1 tenth for each of the 7 lambs.

verses.kjv: One kid of the goats for a sin offering; beside the sin offering of atonement, and the continual burnt offering, and the meat offering of it, and their drink offerings.
verses.web: one male goat for a sin offering, in addition to the sin offering of atonement, and the continual burnt offering, and its meal offering, and their drink offerings.
verses.ct: Also offer 1 male goat as a sin offering. This is in addition to the sin offering of atonement, the daily burnt offering with its grain offering, and their drink offerings.

verses.kjv: And on the fifteenth day of the seventh month ye shall have an holy convocation; ye shall do no servile work, and ye shall keep a feast unto the LORD seven days:
verses.web: “ ‘On the fifteenth day of the seventh month you shall have a holy convocation. You shall do no regular work. You shall keep a feast to LORD seven days.
verses.ct: On the 15th day of the 7th month, hold a holy assembly. Don't do any regular work. Celebrate a feast to the LORD for 7 days.

verses.kjv: And ye shall offer a burnt offering, a sacrifice made by fire, of a sweet savour unto the LORD; thirteen young bullocks, two rams, and fourteen lambs of the first year; they shall be without blemish:
verses.web: You shall offer a burnt offering, an offering made by fire, of a pleasant aroma to LORD: thirteen young bulls, two rams, fourteen male lambs a year old, all without defect;
verses.ct: Present a burnt offering, an offering made by fire as a pleasing aroma to the LORD: 13 young bulls, 2 rams, and 14 one-year-old male lambs, all without any defect.

verses.kjv: And their meat offering shall be of flour mingled with oil, three tenth deals unto every bullock of the thirteen bullocks, two tenth deals to each ram of the two rams,
verses.web: and their meal offering, fine flour mixed with oil: three tenths for every bull of the thirteen bulls, two tenths for each ram of the two rams,
verses.ct: The grain offering that goes with them must be fine flour mixed with oil — 3 tenths of an ephah for each of the 13 bulls, 2 tenths for each of the 2 rams,

verses.kjv: And a several tenth deal to each lamb of the fourteen lambs:
verses.web: and one tenth for every lamb of the fourteen lambs;
verses.ct: and 1 tenth for each of the 14 lambs.

verses.kjv: And one kid of the goats for a sin offering; beside the continual burnt offering, his meat offering, and his drink offering.
verses.web: and one male goat for a sin offering, in addition to the continual burnt offering, its meal offering, and its drink offering.
verses.ct: Also offer 1 male goat as a sin offering. This is in addition to the daily burnt offering with its grain offering and drink offering.

verses.kjv: And on the second day ye shall offer twelve young bullocks, two rams, fourteen lambs of the first year without spot:
verses.web: “ ‘On the second day you shall offer twelve young bulls, two rams, and fourteen male lambs a year old without defect;
verses.ct: On the 2nd day, offer 12 young bulls, 2 rams, and 14 one-year-old male lambs without any defect.

verses.kjv: And their meat offering and their drink offerings for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, shall be according to their number, after the manner:
verses.web: and their meal offering and their drink offerings for the bulls, for the rams, and for the lambs, according to their number, after the ordinance;
verses.ct: The grain offerings and drink offerings for the bulls, rams, and lambs must follow the established regulations based on their number.

verses.kjv: And one kid of the goats for a sin offering; beside the continual burnt offering, and the meat offering thereof, and their drink offerings.
verses.web: and one male goat for a sin offering, in addition to the continual burnt offering, with its meal offering and their drink offerings.
verses.ct: Also offer 1 male goat as a sin offering. This is in addition to the daily burnt offering with its grain offering and drink offerings.

verses.kjv: And on the third day eleven bullocks, two rams, fourteen lambs of the first year without blemish;
verses.web: “ ‘On the third day: eleven bulls, two rams, fourteen male lambs a year old without defect;
verses.ct: On the 3rd day, offer 11 bulls, 2 rams, and 14 one-year-old male lambs without any defect.

verses.kjv: And their meat offering and their drink offerings for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, shall be according to their number, after the manner:
verses.web: and their meal offering and their drink offerings for the bulls, for the rams, and for the lambs, according to their number, after the ordinance;
verses.ct: The grain offerings and drink offerings for the bulls, rams, and lambs must follow the established regulations based on their number.

verses.kjv: And one goat for a sin offering; beside the continual burnt offering, and his meat offering, and his drink offering.
verses.web: and one male goat for a sin offering, in addition to the continual burnt offering, and its meal offering, and its drink offering.
verses.ct: Also offer 1 male goat as a sin offering. This is in addition to the daily burnt offering with its grain offering and drink offering.

verses.kjv: And on the fourth day ten bullocks, two rams, and fourteen lambs of the first year without blemish:
verses.web: “ ‘On the fourth day ten bulls, two rams, fourteen male lambs a year old without defect;
verses.ct: On the 4th day, offer 10 bulls, 2 rams, and 14 one-year-old male lambs without any defect.

verses.kjv: Their meat offering and their drink offerings for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, shall be according to their number, after the manner:
verses.web: their meal offering and their drink offerings for the bulls, for the rams, and for the lambs, according to their number, after the ordinance;
verses.ct: The grain offerings and drink offerings for the bulls, rams, and lambs must follow the established regulations based on their number.

verses.kjv: And one kid of the goats for a sin offering; beside the continual burnt offering, his meat offering, and his drink offering.
verses.web: and one male goat for a sin offering; in addition to the continual burnt offering, its meal offering, and its drink offering.
verses.ct: Also offer 1 male goat as a sin offering. This is in addition to the daily burnt offering with its grain offering and drink offering.

verses.kjv: And on the fifth day nine bullocks, two rams, and fourteen lambs of the first year without spot:
verses.web: “ ‘On the fifth day: nine bulls, two rams, fourteen male lambs a year old without defect;
verses.ct: On the 5th day, offer 9 bulls, 2 rams, and 14 one-year-old male lambs without any defect.

verses.kjv: And their meat offering and their drink offerings for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, shall be according to their number, after the manner:
verses.web: and their meal offering and their drink offerings for the bulls, for the rams, and for the lambs, according to their number, after the ordinance,
verses.ct: The grain offerings and drink offerings for the bulls, rams, and lambs must follow the established regulations based on their number.

verses.kjv: And one goat for a sin offering; beside the continual burnt offering, and his meat offering, and his drink offering.
verses.web: and one male goat for a sin offering, in addition to the continual burnt offering, and its meal offering, and its drink offering.
verses.ct: Also offer 1 male goat as a sin offering. This is in addition to the daily burnt offering with its grain offering and drink offering.

verses.kjv: And on the sixth day eight bullocks, two rams, and fourteen lambs of the first year without blemish:
verses.web: “ ‘On the sixth day: eight bulls, two rams, fourteen male lambs a year old without defect;
verses.ct: On the 6th day, offer 8 bulls, 2 rams, and 14 one-year-old male lambs without any defect.

verses.kjv: And their meat offering and their drink offerings for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, shall be according to their number, after the manner:
verses.web: and their meal offering and their drink offerings for the bulls, for the rams, and for the lambs, according to their number, after the ordinance,
verses.ct: The grain offerings and drink offerings for the bulls, rams, and lambs must follow the established regulations based on their number.

verses.kjv: And one goat for a sin offering; beside the continual burnt offering, his meat offering, and his drink offering.
verses.web: and one male goat for a sin offering; in addition to the continual burnt offering, its meal offering, and the drink offerings of it.
verses.ct: Also offer 1 male goat as a sin offering. This is in addition to the daily burnt offering with its grain offering and drink offering.

verses.kjv: And on the seventh day seven bullocks, two rams, and fourteen lambs of the first year without blemish:
verses.web: “ ‘On the seventh day: seven bulls, two rams, fourteen male lambs a year old without defect;
verses.ct: On the 7th day, offer 7 bulls, 2 rams, and 14 one-year-old male lambs without any defect.

verses.kjv: And their meat offering and their drink offerings for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, shall be according to their number, after the manner:
verses.web: and their meal offering and their drink offerings for the bulls, for the rams, and for the lambs, according to their number, after the ordinance,
verses.ct: The grain offerings and drink offerings for the bulls, rams, and lambs must follow the established regulations based on their number.

verses.kjv: And one goat for a sin offering; beside the continual burnt offering, his meat offering, and his drink offering.
verses.web: and one male goat for a sin offering; in addition to the continual burnt offering, its meal offering, and its drink offering.
verses.ct: Also offer 1 male goat as a sin offering. This is in addition to the daily burnt offering with its grain offering and drink offering.

verses.kjv: On the eighth day ye shall have a solemn assembly: ye shall do no servile work therein:
verses.web: “ ‘On the eighth day you shall have a solemn assembly. You shall do no regular work;
verses.ct: On the 8th day, hold a closing assembly. Don't do any regular work.

verses.kjv: But ye shall offer a burnt offering, a sacrifice made by fire, of a sweet savour unto the LORD: one bullock, one ram, seven lambs of the first year without blemish:
verses.web: but you shall offer a burnt offering, an offering made by fire, a pleasant aroma to LORD: one bull, one ram, seven male lambs a year old without defect;
verses.ct: Present a burnt offering, an offering made by fire as a pleasing aroma to the LORD: 1 bull, 1 ram, and 7 one-year-old male lambs without any defect.

verses.kjv: Their meat offering and their drink offerings for the bullock, for the ram, and for the lambs, shall be according to their number, after the manner:
verses.web: their meal offering and their drink offerings for the bull, for the ram, and for the lambs, shall be according to their number, after the ordinance,
verses.ct: The grain offerings and drink offerings for the bull, the ram, and the lambs must follow the established regulations based on their number.

verses.kjv: And one goat for a sin offering; beside the continual burnt offering, and his meat offering, and his drink offering.
verses.web: and one male goat for a sin offering, in addition to the continual burnt offering, with its meal offering, and its drink offering.
verses.ct: Also offer 1 male goat as a sin offering. This is in addition to the daily burnt offering with its grain offering and drink offering.

verses.kjv: These things ye shall do unto the LORD in your set feasts, beside your vows, and your freewill offerings, for your burnt offerings, and for your meat offerings, and for your drink offerings, and for your peace offerings.
verses.web: “ ‘You shall offer these to LORD in your set feasts—in addition to your vows and your free will offerings—for your burnt offerings, your meal offerings, your drink offerings, and your peace offerings.’ ”
verses.ct: These are the offerings you must present to the LORD at your appointed festivals — in addition to anything you bring for your vows, your freewill offerings, your burnt offerings, your grain offerings, your drink offerings, and your peace offerings.

verses.kjv: And Moses told the children of Israel according to all that the LORD commanded Moses.
verses.web: Moses told the children of Israel according to all that LORD commanded Moses.
verses.ct: Moses told the Israelites everything exactly as the LORD had commanded him.
